text: Rhodium trifluoride is the inorganic compound with the formula RhF3. It is a red-brown, diamagnetic solid. ==Synthesis and structure== The compound is prepared by fluorination of rhodium trichloride: :2 RhCl3 \+ 3 F2 → 2 RhF3 \+ 3 Cl2 According to X-ray crystallography, the compound adopts the same structure as vanadium trifluoride, wherein the metal achieves octahedral coordination geometry. ==References== Category:Fluorides Category:Metal halides Category:Rhodium compounds
title: Rhodium trifluoride
